123312121212212222112122211112.content:
Iggy was proud of his image as a punk. He'd worked hard to get everything right. He wore long torn jeans, chain around his waist, perfectly dyed hair, and a select number of illegal tattoos to up his intimidating factor.

And in a second, it was gone. Elements of it were still there, of course. He could tell from his reflection in the window of a storefront that his hair was still dyed dark and green hues. He still had chains on his belt line. But he certainly hadn't left the house wearing fishnets and make-up. Not to mention a shirt that showed far more cleavage for his new body than he expected. There was also, most obviously, his new female body. The hell was up with this? He couldn't help but stare at his reflection in complete and utter bafflement.

Ramona cackled loudly, much to Iggy's shock. Did she think this funny?

"We fuckin' conned those preps so hard! What a bunch of rubes!"

Iggy's face curled in frustration. "Wha- I think we got bigger problems, bitch!" His hand went to his throat. His voice was so much higher than he was used to.

Ramona blinked and stares in confusion. "...the hell you talking about, Izzy? We made out like bandits."

"I-Izzy? Who's Izzy?"

His girlfriend suddenly looks much more concerned. "Uh. You. Are you alright, girl?"

His eyes widened slowly in comprehension. Whatever happened to him, whatever made him this way, Ramona seemed to think it was normal!

He quickly grabbed her shoulders. "Babe, you have to listen. I'm a dude. Names Iggy."

A raised eyebrow. "Dressed like that?"

"I didn't- I was wearing something else earlier! Dude stuff! Because I'm a goddamn virile man!"

Passerby glanced over in confusion before scurrying away at the sight of the loud Izzy. Even a punk who cared as little about the thoughts of others as Ramona was starting to get uncomfortable.

"Oooookay, girl. Whatever shit those preps were drinking is too much for you."

"The-" The preps. That was it! "That's right- This only happened after I drank what those losers were drinking! That's gotta be the key!"

Iggy began to race back towards the food court. If he hurried, he could still catch and interrogate them! Make them fix all this!

A hand grabbed his.
